item.description:
Please join us for our presentation on "Discover Why Facebook is Quickly Becoming the Top Website in the World and Find out How to Tap Into this Powerful Resource to Grow Your Business."

Facebook has only been available to the public for a few years, but it has quickly become an amazing marketing tool for all types of businesses.  There are many ways to market with Facebook.  It's easy to find a way that matches your personality, yet still be effective for growing your business.

About the Speaker

Kim Reddington is a certified Business Growth and Marketing Coach helping women entrepreneurs who are struggling to see results from their marketing.  Since 1998 Kim has been an entrepreneur marketing her own services while raising her children and knows first hand what works and what doesn't work when marketing your business.  Kim enjoys working from home and sharing her time with her husband and 3 children in Ashland.
item.name: Speaker and Networking Luncheon
